title: Tiger Tail Soup: A Novel of China at War
description: An Lee has the heart of a man. But when the Japanese invade China, it's her beloved husband who joins the army. Until he returns, it's up to her to protect her mother, mother-in-law, daughter and soon-to-be-born son.Surrounded by the enemy, she buries the family gold, stocks the pantry, and watches in dismay as her former teachers flee to Hong Kong. Then, on December 7, 1941, the Japanese attack Pearl Harbor and take control of China's international settlements including An Lee's island home. To survive occupation, she will need all the strength, resilience, and love she can muster.Emotionally charged and lyrical, Tiger Tail Soup captures the drama and suffering of wartime China through the eyes of a brave young woman.
author: Nicki Chen
